name: State Of Mind (itch) (Resilience Inc.)
description:
“State of Mind” is an exploration game that emphasizes on choosing the correct response for a positive state of mind. Within the game, you will walk to different places and meet many people, young and old. Most of them have something to say, and it’s your job to treat them well and keep a positive state of mind through your day.

This game is to be played after the State of Mind lesson plan.
